meanings.sent1: The carking news of the storm approaching filled her with fear.
meanings.sent2: The carking thought of failing the test made him anxious.
meanings.sent3: The carking sound of the alarm clock woke her up abruptly.
meanings.sent4: The carking feeling of loneliness gnawed at his heart.
meanings.sent5: The carking shadow of doubt loomed over their plans.

meanings.sent1: She carking about her missing cat all night.
meanings.sent2: He carking over the upcoming presentation at work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel carking over where to hide its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The old clock carking away in the silent room.
meanings.sent5: The child carking about the monster under the bed.

meanings.sent1: The carking sound of the dripping faucet kept her awake.
meanings.sent2: His carking habit of tapping his pen on the desk annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The carking fly buzzing around the room disrupted the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The carking itch on his back was driving him crazy.
meanings.sent5: The carking noise of the construction site next door was unbearable.
